meanings.definition: The joint between the upper and lower parts of the arm.
meanings.sent1: She accidentally hit her elbow on the table.
meanings.sent2: He wrapped his arm around her elbow for support.
meanings.sent3: The elbow of the river curved gracefully around the bend.
meanings.sent4: The elbow of the road led them to a hidden village.
meanings.sent5: The elbow of the tree branch provided a perfect spot for the bird's nest.

meanings.sent1: She had to elbow her way through the crowd.
meanings.sent2: He gently elbowed his friend to get his attention.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy tried to elbow its toy under the couch.
meanings.sent4: The team decided to elbow their opponents out of the competition.
meanings.sent5: She elbowed the door open with all her strength.

meanings.definition: A pipe fitting with a right-angled bend.
meanings.sent1: The plumber used an elbow to connect the pipes.
meanings.sent2: The elbow joint allowed the pipes to change direction smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The elbow fitting made the water flow around the corner effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: The elbow in the pipe prevented any leaks at the turn.
meanings.sent5: The elbow fitting was crucial for the plumbing system to work properly.
